message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $9,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm not sure I can stretch to $9,000, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $8,500?
